posts.post_title: Lot of 4 - Merchants Gargling Oil/Capadura Cigar "Die Cuts" - MOVED TO AUCTIONS
posts.post_content:
Up for sale are three Merchant's Gargling Oil cards and one Capadura Cigar card.  These were customized by someone's scissors long ago. I am asking $20.00 dlvd for the lot.  Regular Paypal preferred.
